page.title: List of optical disc authoring software

revisions.rev:
{{TOCright}} This is a list of [[optical disc authoring software]].
==Open source== ===Multi-platform=== * [[cdrtools]], a comprehensive [[command line]]-based set of tools for creating and burning [[Compact disc|CDs]], [[DVD]]s and [[Blu-ray]]s. * [[cdrkit]], a fork of cdrtools by the Debian project. * [[cdrdao]], open source software for authoring and ripping of CD-ROMs in [[Optical disc recording modes#CD Disc-At-Once|Disk-At-Once]] mode.
===Linux and Unix=== *[[dvd+rw-tools]], a package for DVD and [[Blu-ray Disc]] writing on Unix and Unix-like systems.
;[[GUI]] ([[cdrtools]] based): * [[Brasero (software)|Brasero]], a GNOME CD/DVD burning application * [[GnomeBaker]], a GNOME CD/DVD burning application * [[Graveman]], a GTK+ CD/DVD burning application - project abandoned * [[K3b]], the [[KDE]] CD/DVD authoring program * [[Nautilus file manager|Nautilus]], the [[GNOME]] file manager (includes basic CD/DVD-burning capabilities) * [[Serpentine (software)|Serpentine]], the GNOME audio CD burning application * [[SimpleBurn]], a GTK+ CD/DVD burning application * [[X-CD-Roast]]
;command-line interface: * [[BashBurn]], a menu-driven program
=== Windows === * [[InfraRecorder]] (cdrkit/cdrtools based) * [[DVD Flick]] ([[ImgBurn]] is included) * [[Saturn Disk Image]], ISO image creation
==Freeware== ===Windows=== * [[CDBurnerXP Pro]] * [[ImgBurn]] * [[Ashampoo Burning Studio]] (version 6 only) * [[DeepBurner|DeepBurner Free]] * [[DVD Decrypter]] * [[DVD Shrink]]
===Mac OS X=== * [[Disco (software)|Disco]]
==Proprietary== ===Mac OS X=== * [[Adobe Encore DVD|Adobe Encore]] * [[DVD Studio Pro]] * [[MacTheRipper]] * [[Roxio Toast]]
===Linux=== * [[GEAR PRO Linux]] * [[Nero Burning ROM#Linux versions|NeroLINUX]]
===Unix=== * [[GEAR PRO Unix]]
===Windows=== * [[Adobe Encore DVD|Adobe Encore]] * [[Alcohol 120%]] * [[Ashampoo Burning Studio]] * [[AVS Video Editor]] * [[Blindwrite]] * [[CDRWIN]] * [[CloneCD]] * [[CloneDVD]] * [[DeepBurner]] * [[DiscJuggler]] * [[Easy CD Creator]] (Now obsolete) * [[Easy Media Creator]] * [[GEAR Video]] * [[MagicISO]] * [[Nero Burning ROM]] * [[Netblender]] * [[PowerISO]] * [[Roxio|Roxio WinOnCD]] * [[Ulead Systems|Ulead DVD software]] * [[UltraISO]]
